001package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.AirlineDumper;
004
005import java.io.PrintWriter;
006import java.io.Writer;
007
008public class PrettyPrinter implements AirlineDumper<Airline> {
009  private final Writer writer;
010
011  public PrettyPrinter(Writer writer) {
012    this.writer = writer;
013  }
014
015  public static String formatFlightNumber(int flightNumber) {
016    return "Number: " + flightNumber;
017  }
018
019  @Override
020  public void dump(Airline airline) {
021    try (
022      PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(this.writer)
023    ) {
024
025      pw.println(airline.getName());
026
027      airline.getFlights().forEach(flight -> {
028        pw.println(formatFlightNumber(flight.getNumber()));
029      });
030
031      pw.flush();
032    }
033
034  }
035}
